subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Angola, the African champion, defeated China, 72-71, in the Stankovic Cup in Hangzhou, China, to sour center Yao Ming’s comeback ahead of next month’s Beijing Games. China rallied from a 14-point fourth-quarter deficit, but lost after Yao missed an offensive rebound as time expired.
